title: Understanding Self-Awareness
text: Self-awareness is a crucial aspect of mental health care. It involves recognizing one's own emotions, thoughts, and behaviors, especially in professional settings.

title: Why is Self-Awareness Important?
text: Being self-aware helps professionals maintain objectivity and empathy, ensuring they provide the best care possible.

hintAnswer: a nurse being aware of their own behavior, responses, and thoughts during interactions with clients
title: Defining Self-Awareness
text: What does self-awareness mean in the context of nursing?
choices: a nurse being aware of their own behavior, responses, and thoughts during interactions with clients
>a nurse focusing solely on the client's behavior
>a nurse ignoring their own emotions during client interactions
